spaceinvaders.client.gui.entities

Class GraphicalEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceinvaders.client.gui.entities.GraphicalEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Invader, InvaderBullet, Player, PlayerBullet, Shield

    public abstract class GraphicalEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, Drawable
    Game entity that can be drawn on the screen.
